title: Infinite Magicraid Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the game Infinite Magicraid. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier, with S Tier being the best heroes and C Tier being the worst. The list is based on the heroes overall performance in all game modes, but it is important to consider your playstyle and team composition when choosing heroes. Please note that this is just a general tier list and the best heroes for you may vary.
